summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2021 regarding a discovery request for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The FBI Victim Services Division is requesting contact information for victims, witnesses, and their attorneys who communicated with FBI personnel, to be provided to the USAO for the upcoming trial.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the New York investigation alongside Ghislaine Maxwell, with a trial scheduled.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the co-subject of the New York investigation with Jeffrey Epstein, with a trial scheduled for November 2021.

connections.description: Named together as the subjects of the New York investigation (50D-NY-3027571) which is scheduled for trial.

events.title: Maxwell Trial Date
events.description: The New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled for trial.

events.title: Previous Briefing
events.description: The sender provided some resources via email to VS and her mother at a briefing on this date.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively gathering discovery for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial as of September 2021.
The request sought all communications (texts, emails, voicemails) with any victim, witness, or victim's attorney involved in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
The request had a tight deadline, requiring information by COB Monday, September 13, 2021.
The document references a specific FBI investigation number: 50D-NY-3027571.
